rooms.name: Entrance and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that leads into a living area with Mediterranean accents including natural stone finishes and terracotta tiles. Adheres to Vastu by ensuring the main entrance faces an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open dining area adjacent to the living room with ample natural light and Mediterranean decor, balancing energy flow per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom for guests featuring essential amenities and good ventilation, placed according to local building norms.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with efficient space planning and integrated storage solutions, ensuring easy access while maintaining aesthetic appeal.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: An inviting double door entrance in line with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large window opening to enhance natural light and ventilation in the living area.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Roll-up garage door for convenience and secure access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Larger master bedroom designed for comfort and privacy incorporating Mediterranean-style decor; ensuite bathroom ensures privacy.

rooms.name: Child/Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy secondary bedroom following local standards for residential living space.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with a quiet ambiance, strategic placement to avoid disturbances as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Bedroom Window
openings.description: Optimized for privacy and natural light.

openings.name: Office Window
openings.description: Provides ventilation and sufficient daylight for work.
